wikitext.*:
<noinclude>确定[[widget:WarshipGirls]]不会再开放更换背景，本模板已被完全限制而无效
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#ifexpr:{{{月|{{LOCALMONTH}}}}} >= 3 and {{{月|{{LOCALMONTH}}}}} <= 5 
|{{#ifexpr:{{{时|{{LOCALHOUR}}}}} >= 6 and {{{时|{{LOCALHOUR}}}}} <= 17 |{{#widget:WarshipGirls|pic={{filepath:WarshipGirlsHomeportSpring.jpg}}}}|{{#widget:WarshipGirls|pic={{filepath:WarshipGirlsHomeportSpring_eve.jpg}}}}}}<!--判断是否为春季，是则判断昼夜，不是则继续下方代码-->
|{{#ifexpr:{{{月|{{LOCALMONTH}}}}} >= 6 and {{{月|{{LOCALMONTH}}}}} <= 8 
|{{#ifexpr:{{{时|{{LOCALHOUR}}}}} >= 6 and {{{时|{{LOCALHOUR}}}}} <= 17 |{{#widget:WarshipGirls|pic={{filepath:WarshipGirlsHomeportSummer.jpg}}}}|{{#widget:WarshipGirls|pic={{filepath:WarshipGirlsHomeportSummer_eve.jpg}}}}}}<!--判断是否为夏季，是则判断昼夜，不是则继续下方代码-->
|{{#ifexpr:{{{月|{{LOCALMONTH}}}}} >= 9 and {{{月|{{LOCALMONTH}}}}} <= 11 
|{{#ifexpr:{{{时|{{LOCALHOUR}}}}} >= 6 and {{{时|{{LOCALHOUR}}}}} <= 17 |{{#widget:WarshipGirls|pic={{filepath:WarshipGirlsHomeportAutumn.jpg}}}}|{{#widget:WarshipGirls|pic={{filepath:WarshipGirlsHomeportAutumn_eve.jpg}}}}}}<!--判断是否为秋季，是则判断昼夜，不是则判断为冬季-->
|{{#ifexpr:{{{时|{{LOCALHOUR}}}}} >= 6 and {{{时|{{LOCALHOUR}}}}} <= 17 |{{#widget:WarshipGirls|pic={{filepath:WarshipGirlsHomeportWinter.jpg}}}}|{{#widget:WarshipGirls|pic={{filepath:WarshipGirlsHomeportWinter_eve.jpg}}}}}}
}}
}}
}}</includeonly>
